Mauro Sunda

      USB Forensics Investigation

      DFIR Autopsy Linux

      Overview

      This project investigates a USB drive related to a computer fraud case, focusing on identifying relevant artifacts, recovering deleted files, and validating digital evidence using forensic techniques.

      Tools Used

      • Autopsy
      • Foremost
      • FTK Imager

      What I Learned

      • File recovery techniques and carving deleted data from storage media
      • Metadata analysis to establish timelines and understand file activity
      • Evidence validation using cryptographic hashes (MD5/SHA-256) to ensure data integrity and maintain forensic soundness
